muclient.script:
sub set_func(name, output, array) dim komenda komenda = world.replace(world.getvariable("funkcyjny"), "\n", ";", True) dim aOpis aOpis = Split(komenda, ";") world.colournote "yellow", "black", "Funkcja = " & aOpis(0) end sub
sub funkcja(name, output, array) dim aOpis if len(world.getvariable("funkcyjny")) < 5 then exit sub end if aOpis = Split(world.getvariable("funkcyjny"), ";") aOpis(0) = "oooooooooooops" aOpis = join(aOpis, ";") aOpis = world.replace(aOpis, "oooooooooooops;", "", False) world.send world.FixupEscapeSequences(world.replace( aOpis , ";", "\n", True)) end sub
sub help_script(name, output, array) world.note "============================================================" world.note "| Skrypt: Bindy rozne |" world.note "|----------------------------------------------------------|" world.note "| Aliasy: |" world.note "| func - odpalenie binda |" world.note "============================================================" end sub
